posts.description: The Most Important Design Jobs Of The Future
posts.extended: Designers at Google, Microsoft, Autodesk, Ideo, Artefact, Teague, Lunar, Huge, New Deal, and fuseproject predict 18 new design jobs. Yesterday's graphic designers are today's UX designers.

posts.description: Hoppy beer is awful—or at least, its bitterness is ruining craft beer’s reputation.
posts.extended: As a beer writer, I often find myself preaching the word about craft beer to people who don’t want to hear it. There are a lot of Bud Light fans and people who’d rather sip a zinfandel, even in the craft beer capital of the world, Portland, Ore., where I live.
